Dermot O'Leary explained to the Daily Mail: He's a very interesting man, Simon Cowell . He's incredibly supportive as a boss and he shows a lot of compassion, but he hates indecision and he hates fear.`` What he loves is confidence without arrogance, which is the holy grail. me. You're a pro. You're a hell of a lot better than others in this town.'' Howard Kurtz suspects that Donald Rumsfeld 's goal with this memoir is to leave readers with the same conclusion. But it contains few surprises and, after so many years of divisive debate, is unlikely to change many minds, writes Howard Kurtz .`` What is known is that he has in these 50 chapters marshaled his best defense; only history's final verdict remains unknown.''
